statements: SELECT * FROM Remote_Work_Resources;
SELECT resource_title, resource_url FROM Remote_Work_Resources WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT resource_id, resource_title FROM Remote_Work_Resources WHERE resource_id > 10 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_title, category FROM Remote_Work_Resources WHERE category = 'Education' ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT resource_title, resource_description FROM Remote_Work_Resources WHERE resource_url LIKE '%https%';
SELECT resource_title, resource_description FROM Remote_Work_Resources;
SELECT * FROM Remote_Work_Resources WHERE category = 'Tech';
SELECT resource_id AS ID, category AS Category FROM Remote_Work_Resources ORDER BY resource_title DESC;
SELECT resource_title, resource_url FROM Remote_Work_Resources WHERE resource_url LIKE '%github%';
SELECT * FROM Remote_Work_Resources ORDER BY category ASC, resource_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM best_practices;
SELECT title, category FROM best_practices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, rating FROM resources WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT description FROM best_practices WHERE category = 'Database';
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE link LIKE '%github.com%';
SELECT * FROM best_practices WHERE category = 'Data Management'
SELECT id, title, category FROM best_practices ORDER BY category, title DESC
SELECT title, description FROM best_practices WHERE id = 1 OR category = 'Security'
SELECT title, link, rating FROM resources WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, title
SELECT id, title, description FROM best_practices WHERE title LIKE '%best%'
SELECT * FROM best_practices;
SELECT title, description FROM best_practices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'Documentation';
SELECT resource_id, title, link FROM resources ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, user_name, timestamp FROM comments WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM best_practices WHERE category = 'Data Management';
SELECT title, description FROM best_practices WHERE id = 3 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM best_practices GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT r.title, r.type, c.comment_text FROM resources r JOIN comments c ON r.resource_id = c.resource_id WHERE r.type = 'Article' ORDER BY c.timestamp DESC;
SELECT b.title, b.description, c.user_name, c.timestamp FROM best_practices b LEFT JOIN comments c ON b.id = c.resource_id AND c.user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT post_title, post_author FROM best_practices;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_category = 'Programming';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users ORDER BY user_joined_date DESC;
SELECT comment_content, comment_author, comment_date FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name, tag_description FROM tags WHERE tag_id > 3;
SELECT post_title, post_author, post_date FROM best_practices WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_category = 'Tutorial' ORDER BY resource_link DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_joined_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT post_title, post_author, comment_content FROM best_practices JOIN comments ON best_practices.post_id = comments.post_id;
SELECT tag_name, tag_description FROM tags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%database%' OR tag_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM remote_work_best_practices;
SELECT id, title, description FROM remote_work_tools WHERE category = 'Communication';
SELECT id, platform, features FROM remote_work_communication ORDER BY platform DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_challenges WHERE id = 3;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM remote_work_tips LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_best_practices;
SELECT title, description FROM remote_work_best_practices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, category, description FROM remote_work_tools WHERE category = 'Collaboration';
SELECT platform, purpose FROM remote_work_communication ORDER BY platform DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, description, solution FROM remote_work_challenges WHERE solution IS NOT NULL;
